title: Case-Based Learning for Strengthening Creative Instructional Design Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Instructional Design Theory and Practical Experience
context.additional_context: Provision of collaborative tools and asynchronous discussion boards for learners.

learning_goals: Learners can apply a creative instructional design framework to real-world cases with at least 90% accuracy
Learners can propose at least three innovative teaching strategies for solving complex social problems
Learners can complete instructional design portfolios reflecting creativity metrics through peer evaluation
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
